程序包 io.xdag.crypto.randomx

类 RandomXVM

java.lang.Object
io.xdag.crypto.randomx.RandomXVM
所有已实现的接口:
AutoCloseable
public class RandomXVM extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Encapsulation for managing RandomX Virtual Machine (VM).

  • 构造器概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RandomXVM

      public RandomXVM(Set<RandomXFlag> flags, RandomXCache cache, RandomXDataset dataset)
      Creates a VM instance with the given flags, cache, and dataset.
      参数:
      flags - Configuration flags for the VM.
      cache - Cache pointer.
      dataset - Dataset pointer (can be null).

  • 方法详细资料

    • setCache

      public void setCache(RandomXCache cache)
      Switches the cache used by this VM.
      参数:
      cache - New cache pointer.

    • setDataset

      public void setDataset(RandomXDataset dataset)
      Switches the dataset used by this VM.
      参数:
      dataset - New dataset pointer.

    • calculateHash

      public void calculateHash(byte[] input, byte[] output)
      Calculates a hash using the VM.
      参数:
      input - Input data as a byte array.
      output - Output buffer for the calculated hash.

    • getPoint

      public com.sun.jna.Pointer getPoint()

    • close

      public void close()
      Releases the allocated VM.
      指定者:
      close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
